meanings.definition: To take great pleasure or delight in something.
meanings.sent1: The children were revelling in the colorful fireworks display.
meanings.sent2: She was revelling in the beauty of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The puppy was revelling in the joy of chasing its tail.
meanings.sent4: The artist's heart was revelling in the freedom of expression through painting.
meanings.sent5: The old man's eyes were revelling in the memories of his youth.

meanings.definition: To engage in lively and noisy festivities or celebrations.
meanings.sent1: The whole town was revelling in the excitement of the carnival.
meanings.sent2: They were revelling in the music and dancing at the party.
meanings.sent3: The monkeys were revelling in the chaos of the zoo visitors.
meanings.sent4: The city streets were revelling in the lights and sounds of New Year's Eve.
meanings.sent5: The fans were revelling in the victory of their favorite team.
